LOS 60.g
Risk management of alternative investments requires understanding of the unique
circumstances for each category.
• Standard deviation of returns may be misleading as a measure of risk.
Use of derivatives introduces operational, financial, counterparty, and liquidity risks.
Performance for some alternative investment categories depends primarily on
management expertise.
Hedge funds and private equity funds are less transparent than traditional
investments.
Many alternative investments are illiquid.
• Indices of historical returns and standard deviations may not be good indicators of
future returns and volatility.
Correlations vary across periods and are affected by events.
